00075 void Micropolis::initMapArrays()
00076 {
00077     short i;
00078 
00079     if (!mapBase) {
00080         mapBase = (unsigned short *)newPtr(
00081             sizeof(unsigned short) *
00082             WORLD_W * WORLD_H);
00083     }
00084 
00085     for (i = 0; i < WORLD_W; i++) {
00086         map[i] = (unsigned short *)(mapBase + (i * WORLD_H));
00087     }
00088 
00089     resHist = (short *)newPtr(HISTORY_LENGTH);
00090     comHist = (short *)newPtr(HISTORY_LENGTH);
00091     indHist = (short *)newPtr(HISTORY_LENGTH);
00092     moneyHist = (short *)newPtr(HISTORY_LENGTH);
00093     pollutionHist = (short *)newPtr(HISTORY_LENGTH);
00094     crimeHist = (short *)newPtr(HISTORY_LENGTH);
00095     miscHist = (short *)newPtr(MISC_HISTORY_LENGTH);
00096 }
00097 
00098 
00100 void Micropolis::destroyMapArrays()
00101 {
00102 
00103     if (mapBase != NULL) {
00104         freePtr(mapBase);
00105         mapBase = NULL;
00106     }
00107 
00108     memset(map, 0, sizeof(short *) * WORLD_W);
00109 
00110     populationDensityMap.clear();
00111     trafficDensityMap.clear();
00112     pollutionDensityMap.clear();
00113     landValueMap.clear();
00114     crimeRateMap.clear();
00115 
00116     tempMap1.clear();
00117     tempMap2.clear();
00118     tempMap3.clear();
00119 
00120     terrainDensityMap.clear();
00121 
00122     if (resHist != NULL) {
00123         freePtr(resHist);
00124         resHist = NULL;
00125     }
00126 
00127     if (comHist != NULL) {
00128         freePtr(comHist);
00129         comHist = NULL;
00130     }
00131 
00132     if (indHist != NULL) {
00133         freePtr(indHist);
00134         indHist = NULL;
00135     }
00136 
00137     if (moneyHist != NULL) {
00138         freePtr(moneyHist);
00139         moneyHist = NULL;
00140     }
00141 
00142     if (pollutionHist != NULL) {
00143         freePtr(pollutionHist);
00144         pollutionHist = NULL;
00145     }
00146 
00147     if (crimeHist != NULL) {
00148         freePtr(crimeHist);
00149         crimeHist = NULL;
00150     }
00151 
00152     if (miscHist != NULL) {
00153         freePtr(miscHist);
00154         miscHist = NULL;
00155     }
00156 
00157 }
